Module ing.sw.puddu.rios.rizzo
Package it.polimi.ingsw.view

Class ClientView

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.view.View
      • it.polimi.ingsw.view.ClientView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FeedObserver, UserInterfaceObserver
    public class ClientView
extends View
implements UserInterfaceObserver
    A class that takes the role of View in the MVC pattern on the client On the client, the Client class takes the role of both Controller and model and communicates with the ClientView accordingly, with the exception of interactions that are outside of the MVC pattern, such as the setting of the user interface

      forwards the information regarding the association between an id and a name to the user interface and the Connection FSM

      forwards the number of players of the game to the Connection FSM
      void updateOk​(int id)
      if the ok is for this client, forwards to the right FSM if it is expected or throws an exception if it was not expected
      void updatePlayerLose​(int id)
      notifies the loss if the losing player's id matches the client's id puts the losing client in the correct state, and removes the losing client's workers from the ui
      void updatePlayerWin​(int id)
      announces a win or a loss depending on whether the winning id matches the client id also puts the Game FSM in the proper state
      void updateReadAction​(Action action)
      forwards the action the player took to the correct FSM this is either the setup FSM if the action is a SetupAction, and the Game FSM otherwise
